Mendokusai

Tartarus

More Poker

01 Mar 2018

I played a short session today and it was definitely the best one of the year so far. It was fun, I played tight and thought my decisions through, just focusing on the basics and trying to take notes on my opponents. This is the first time in a couple of months I have felt like I can do this.
